attributes.action: Include trans people on the ban on conversion therapy
attributes.additional_details: Wether you agree with people being trans or not, everyone deserves to be protected against conversion therapy and the lasting traumatic effects it has on people. Trans people need to be protected in the same way gay people are being protected. No one deserves to be put through the emotional and physically torment of conversion therapy.
attributes.background: To include trans people in the protection against conversion therapy

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ensure Trans people are fully protected under any conversion therapy ban: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613556

Ban LGBT+ Conversion Therapy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613518
